#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)

project(file_seeder)

#compile x64
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -m64")

set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES "")

#use c++11 stand
add_definitions(-std=c++11)

add_executable(file_seeder config.cpp logger.cpp main.cpp seed_executor.cpp torrent_client.cpp wapper.cpp)

#include libwztk
include_directories(/home/duocore/NetBeansProjects/LinuxCppABC/wztk/WZTKUtil/include)

list(APPEND CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH "/home/duocore/NetBeansProjects/LinuxCppABC/wztk/dist/Debug/GNU-Linux")
find_library(LIBWZTK_PATH wztk)
if(NOT LIBWZTK_PATH)
message(FATAL_ERROR "libwztk not found")
endif(NOT LIBWZTK_PATH) 
message(STATUS ${LIBWZTK_PATH} " found")

find_library(BOOST_SYSTEM_PATH boost_system)
if(NOT BOOST_SYSTEM_PATH)
message(FATAL_ERROR "libboost_system not found")
endif(NOT BOOST_SYSTEM_PATH)
message(STATUS ${BOOST_SYSTEM_PATH} " found")

target_link_libraries(file_seeder torrent ${BOOST_SYSTEM_PATH} pthread boost_thread ${LIBWZTK_PATH} "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
